title: Peter Thiel to Step Down From Facebook Parent Meta’s Board
sub_head: Investor to focus efforts on electing GOP candidates who support Trump’s agenda in 2022 races
body:
Peter Thiel, one of Facebook ’s earliest investors and its longest-serving outside board member, is planning to step down from his position at the social-media giant, parent company Meta Platforms Inc. said Monday.
Mr. Thiel intends to focus his efforts on helping Republican candidates supporting the agenda of former President Donald Trump in the 2022 midterm elections, according to a person familiar with the matter.
